Module contents¶

SolarSystem¶

  • Planets positions around Sun.

  • Planets positions around Earth.

  • Moon positions around Earth.

  • Sunrise/Sunset.

  • Moonrise/Moonset, Moon Phase.

  • Convert between different coordinate systems.
